title: Tuck & Cover
description: *This title is no longer available for purchase. It has been combined with Battle Buddy and re-released Dreamspinner Press. Tuck & CoverYou may have read Tuck’s diary entries, but they don’t tell the whole story. Tuck will argue the point, but he definitely got a few details wrong—not that I blame him. He was, if you remember, a little sexually frustrated at the time. He probably wasn’t thinking straight. I’ll never get tired of teasing him about that. Anyway, here’s what really happened.Rangers lead the way! – Owen
author: S.J.D. Peterson
